String.string: I'm cold, hungry, and pissed. In case you couldn't tell.
For the federation. Always for the federation.
Talk to {@linkcreature:231#1008$$Pedr}, so {@linkcreature:231#1023$$Ghauth} doesn't lose his temper.
"Let's hope it doesn't come to that."
Report to {@linkcreature:231#1023$$Ghauth} at the {@Rgn:31008$$Glacial Bay Research Station}.
